questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A dish of food
C) A building
D) A group of people

A) A piece of meat
B) A bowl of soup
C) A plate with a food arrangement
D) A glass of wine

A) A plain wall
B) A tiled surface
C) A wooden table
D) A scenic view

A) A napkin
B) A plate of food
C) A fork and knife

A) Parsley

C) Basil
